creator: agusmba@terra.es
text:
- Added release 1.8-dev
- Modified release 1.7-dev to match the english version
- Added a mostly empty action to release 0.13.0 so the xml file is valid as per
its dtd. (this is missing from the english version too, but I won't submit that yet)

I made the patch with
cvs -u -w changes.xml

the -w to ignore spaces because otherwise the whole file came out in the diff.
There must be a problem with EOLs or something like that.
I'm using jEdit in WinXP to edit the xml files.

Created attachment 3280
plain text patch for changes.xml (spanish)
creator: agusmba@terra.es
